name: Biotech Consultants Ltd.
membership: We have been involved with UK science research councils such as BBSRC and members of their Industrial Biotechnology and Bioenergy Networks (NIBBs). We have also been involved with Innovate UK.
goal: BTCL is a research and development company specialising in providing solutions for optimising the performance of the microorganisms for scale up, enhancing microbial production of high value chemicals through selected evolution and pathway enhancement techniques.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: We are following all the EU policies and legislation related to collaborative RTD projects under FP7 and Horizon 2020 programmes.
